children.text: The builder has not provided a manhole access point to safely access this roof area to confirm that there are no defects in the roof cavity area, such as leaks, insulation gaps, electrical and plumbing issues etc.

The requirement for a roof cavity manhole access point depends on several factors, however we strongly recommend that they are installed to all roof areas (in a discreet and safe location). In the event that a manhole access point cannot be provided, we encourage the owner to request detailed photograpghs from the builder of all areas to confirm there are no defects for their records.
